name: KiwiTech
description:
KiwiTech is an innovation-led tech-startup investor, IT Services and Business Solutions Company. We provide technology-enabled innovative digital solutions across a wide range of industries, including publishing, healthcare, media & entertainment, education, finance and government.
We support innovation by helping passionate, talented, and daring entrepreneurs build their ideas into products and create great success stories. We empower our entrepreneurs with technology, mentorship and capital investment. With a growing portfolio of 110+ companies, we not only help entrepreneurs with the launch but also scale their businesses. We believe in co-building great companies with our entrepreneurs.
READ MORE...
